description: Lower of pair of consecutive happy numbers.
references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems Number Theory, Sect. E34.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Happy Number
mathematica: f[n_] := Total[IntegerDigits[n]^2]; t = Select[Range[5000], NestWhile[f, #, UnsameQ, All] == 1 &]; t[[Select[Range[Length[t] - 1],  t[[#]] == t[[# + 1]] - 1 &]]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Aug 23 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
